name: Orbital Assault (MGVoltage)
description:
A similar game to Space Invaders with a personal touch to it.  Created for an assignment. While there are no levels, there is a small boss fight at the end of the wave. There are also multiple different bullet types that have unique characteristics to them, press up to try them out!

Credits

Art: Me

Programming: Me (assisted by a good friend)

Sounds: Me

Special thanks to Stencyl for the game template to begin with.
